data.title: Song: All God's Chillun Got Rhythm written by Walter Jurmann, Bronislaw Kaper, Gus Kahn
data.meta_description: The song All God's Chillun Got Rhythm was written by Gus Kahn, Bronislaw Kaper and Walter Jurmann and was first recorded by Dick McDonough and Carl Kress Orchestra - Vocal Chorus by Barry McKinley in 1937. It was covered by Sonny Clark, Quintet Paola Tomelleri Fritz Hartschuh, Dick Meldonian Trio, Palast Orchester mit seinem Sänger Max Raabe and other artists.
